name: The Schandmaske of Duntrench
data: It decreases the users wisdom adequately.
It increases the users intelligence impressively.
It increases the users charisma impressively.
It has pathetic armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration nicely.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'impart knowledge'.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives decent bonus to the spell 'dirge of despair'.
It gives decent bonus to the spell 'leomund's lament'.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'impart lore'.
The Schandmaske remembers and recalls malicious songs.
